name: Wire Killer
description:
This is the early prototype of an idea i had about 1 year ago, in parallel of a bigger project, so it didn't go rather far... But by replaying it i found myself having kind of fun (in all objectivity of course), so here it is !

The idea was to make a sort of Geometry Wars-like in an unusual 3D space configuration (i let you discover, it's a pain to describe!). As a early demo it has small content : 2 maps, 2 enemy types, a yet hazardous setting of the enemies spawnings, but including these missings don't hesitate to tell what you think of the concept.

As the demo uses a homebrew engine, it would help me that you also report bugs or glitches you could meet (maybe in collisions?).

Minimum configuration :

  • OpenGL 3.3 or higher
  • Windows 8 or higher
